comment: Do they really think dead Jews will make more people vote democrat? Or was this guy just a dumb, frustrated boomer? Going and shooting Jews isn't going to do shit in a country of million NPCs. Really smells like an FF given the timing.
amr:
# ::snt Do they really think dead Jews will make more people vote democrat? Or was this guy just a dumb, frustrated boomer? Going and shooting Jews isn't going to do shit in a country of million NPCs. Really smells like an FF given the timing.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (t / think-01

            :ARG1 (m2 / make-02

                        :mod (r / religious-group
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Jew"))
                        :ARG1-of (d / die-01))
                  :ARG1 (v / vote-01

                        :ARG1 (p3 / political-party
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Democrat"))))
            :polarity (a / amr-unknown)

      :snt2 (o / or

                  :ARG1 (s2 / shit)

                        :consist-of (n4 / NPC
                              :quant 1000000))))
      :snt3 (s3 / smell-02
            :ARG1 (t4 / thing
                  :name (n5 / name
                        :op1 "FF"))
            :ARG1-of (r4 / real-04)
            :ARG1-of (c2 / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (t5 / time-02))))
